Detailed Description

Class managing tree search.

T_searcher is class which manages searching the tree of possible positions, using standart minimax algorithm together with pruning techniques and heuristics. The most remarkable is it's recursive function T_searcher::search.

Member Function Documentation

void add_tree_size_to_dyn_heur ( int  level_,
Coordinates  coordinates_,
int  tree_size_ 
)

Setting values in dynamic heuristic ( tree size ).

Parameters:
[in] level_ Actual level in the subtree.
[in] coordinates_ Coordinates of the move whose subtree size is going to be stored.
[in] tree_size_ Stored tree_size.

This function creates information for using tree size heuristic. It fills information about how big subtrees where under different moves in different levels of searched tree so far.

Search_result search ( Node_type  node_type_,
int  level,
Group_status  alfa,
Group_status  beta,
bool  last_move_pass,
bool  last_move_ko 
)

This method performs tree search.

Parameters:
[in] node_type_ Tells whether actual node is of type nt_min ( defender ) or nt_max ( attacker ).
[in] level Actual node's depth in the tree.
[in] alfa Value of alfa attribute neccessary for alfa-beta pruning.
[in] beta Value of beta attribute neccessary for alfa-beta pruning.
[in] last_move_pass Informs whether the preceeding move was pass.
[in] last_move_ko Informs whether the preceeding move took ko for life.

This method ( together with Tsearcher::search_son ) provides full functionality for tree search. It implements basic minimax algorithm together with alfa beta pruning, also calls neccessary heuristics and forward pruning techniques, it also cooperates with Sgf_printer in creating proper sgf output file.

Search_result search_son ( Coordinates  coordinates_,
Node_type  node_type_,
int  level_,
Group_status  alfa,
Group_status  beta,
bool  ko_for_life 
)

Searches son of actual node and returns found Group_status.

Parameters:
[in] node_type_ Tells whether actual node is of type nt_min ( defender ) or nt_max ( attacker ).
[in] coordinates_ Which move is to be tried.
[in] level Actual node's depth in the tree.
[in] alfa Value of alfa attribute neccessary for alfa-beta pruning.
[in] beta Value of beta attribute neccessary for alfa-beta pruning.
[in] ko_for_life If set to true then move was taking a ko and is a possible ko for life
Returns:
Returns result of the search in the son.

This method's main purpose is to call T_searcher::search method ( with given parametres). Thus these two methods are in undirect recursion relationship. Other tasks done within this function are : repetition cutoff, adequate sgf printing, ...
